message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer ensures we both benefit.
This offer accounts for the time pressure and ensures you get a decent share before inflation erodes its value, Alice.
The inflation is hurting us both, Bob. Let's be fair and split the difference of our previous offers.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. This is a fair offer considering the inflation is affecting you more than me.
Bob, we're running out of time. This offer meets you halfway between our last offers and acknowledges the time pressure we're both under.
Alice, this is it.  A perfectly even split.  Take it before the inflation eats away any more of your share and we both lose out!
